column2: It is time to take bake lands that were once lost during unstable times. The Imperial borders shall be restored!
Enforce Danegeld
By enforcing the Danegeld we get payed what we would normally have to raid for, saving us many precious warriors.
Enforce the Danegeld
War to make $DEFENDER$ pay the Danegeld
Heregeld
Shatter the Holy Roman Empire.

An end shall finally be brought to the heretical empire of the Germans! They claim to Holy and Roman while they lack both qualities. We shall liberate them from their idiotic Kaiser and bring forth our own true Holy nature to the seamingly barbaric peoples of Germania.
War to dismantle the Holy Roman Empire
